Because of inappropriate attention,
I was tormented by lustful desire.
In the past I was restless,
not in control of my mind.
I was overcome by defilements,
following the perception of beauty;
I did not attain mental tranquility,
following a mind full of lust.
I became thin, pale, and haggard,
and wandered for seven years.
